participant_1.background:

i work at a bar.
My family is small, and we don't have a lot of money

I train my dogs and listen to death metal.
I'm visiting my family for the first time in a long time and I'm really excited to see them!
i like long walks on the beach.
i just bought new hoop earrings.
I often take my best friend to my grandmother's place for a visit.

content.text: Hey there! How's your day going?
It's going pretty well! I'm visiting my family for the first time in a long time and I'm really excited to see them. How about you?
Sounds like a great time! I'm doing alright, I just got off work and I'm relaxing at home.
What do you do for work?
I work at a bar, it's pretty fun. What about you?
I'm a dog trainer, I love it!
That's so cool! I've always wanted to train a dog, but I've never had the time.
It's really rewarding, I love seeing how much my dogs learn and grow.
I bet! Do you have any dogs of your own?
Yes, I have two poodles, they're my best friends.
That's awesome! I love poodles, they're so cute.
I'm glad you're having a good time visiting your family, it sounds like you're really close with them.
Thanks, I am! I'm really lucky to have such a great family.
Me too, I'm really close with my family.
That's great! I'm glad you have a good support system.
Thanks, you too! I'm sure you're going to have a great time with your family.
